README.md:
# LIONESSR
LIONESS function for R

LIONESS, or Linear Interpolation to Obtain Network Estimates for Single Samples, can be used to reconstruct single-sample networks (http://arxiv.org/pdf/1505.06440.pdf). This code implements the LIONESS equation in the "lioness" function in R to reconstruct single-sample Pearson correlation networks. It can be easily adapted to work with other network reconstruction algorithms by changing the function "netFun". It works with both unipartite and bipartite networks. "netFun_bipartite.R" is a "toy" bipartite network reconstruction algorithm.
